channel.title: How to make a certain number of things disappear?
channel.description: How do I make only a certain number of something disappear... like, if someone has 20 runes, how do I make it so that if they type a command only 10 of the runes disappear.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 12:06:06 PM[/size][hr]Somebody knows. :)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 12:28:19 PM[/size][hr]C'mon peoples.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 12:38:10 PM[/size][hr]All y'all know! I KNOW IT!!!

item.title: How to make a certain number of things disappear?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“jensie, post:4, topic:80611”]so like ::remove 0995 10 ?[/quote]Yes, but something that I can put in my client.java, like deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), #) but that only takes a certain number of that item.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 02:20:29 PM[/size][hr]whispers SOMEBODY KNOWS!!!

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a certain number of things disappear?

item.title: How to make a certain number of things disappear?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“jensie, post:2, topic:80611”]What you mean, you should explain yourself better. Do you mean removing 10 runes…??[/quote]No… just removing a certain number of an item, not removing every single one of that item from your inventory, only a certain number of that object.

Read full topic
